feed.title: Dozzle Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v6.5.0
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Groups containers by stack or compose when possible  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2893 (ec03e)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Removes toSorted() for older browsers that do not support it  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2895 (e4e69)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v6.5.1
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Implement sticky collapsed and expanded groups on side menu  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2901 (81705)
  • Only groups containers when there is more than one  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2902 (f4dd1)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v6.5.2
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Add Turkish language support  -  by @amir20 and hasanbeder in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2912 (588cd)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • deps:
  • Update module github.com/docker/docker to v26.0.2+incompatible [security]  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2906 (b5b86)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2911 (c49b7)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v6.6.0
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Downloads visible streams only instead of all  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2924 (cc8e7)
  • Sorts homepage every 10 seconds  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2929 (deaef)
  • Shows hosts in cards with their respective stats and updates the container table to filter by host ü•≥  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2932 (44f68)
  • Adds generate subcommand to auto generate users.yml  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2939 (a991e)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2919 (53b91)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2920 (44834)
  • Update dependency vite to v5.2.11  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2928 (88f0a)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2930 (b0083)
  • Update dependency unplugin-vue-macros to ^2.9.2  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2933 (fdffb)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2937 (d37c1)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v6.6.2
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes broken homepage with stats  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2956 (dafc9)
    View changes on GitHub

Fixes from 6.6.1

6.6.1 was skipped due to a bug.

üöÄ Features

  • Adding debug log when host-specific certificate path not found - by Freddy Grande in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2948 (8433f)
  • Uses expoentital average for host - by Amir Raminfar in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2951 (4b3d2)
  • Makes host cards more responsive on mobile - by Amir Raminfar in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2949 (0a224)
  • Polish language added - by Marcin Wo≈Çosz in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2954 (8a016)

üêû Bug Fixes

  • Brings back labels CPU and bases CPU on one core. See #2944 - by Amir Raminfar in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2945 and https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2944 (4b046)
  • Updates fr.yml - by Fabeuss in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2950 (2864b)
  • deps: Update all non-major dependencies - by renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2943 (5b12a)
View changes on GitHub
